paragraph.value: In Table 2, we compare the development set results of the state of the art methods with the BERT model trained on different retrieved evidence sets. The BERT claim verification system even if it is trained on the UKP-Athene sentence retrieval component (Hanselowski et al., 2018), the state of the art method, recall, improves both label accuracy and
. Training based on the BERT sentence retrieval predictions significantly enhances the verification results because while it explicitly improves the

by providing correct evidence sentences, it provides training set for the verification system. The large BERTs are only trained on retrieval systems, and as expected significantly improve the performance.

Note: It seems there was some text repetition due to an error in the input which I have removed while annotating. If any specific values from the data need to be annotated further, please provide them.
